title: Passionate pursuits
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Health
abstract: A testament to an amazing life.
description: This story was created for Robin Hodder's grandchildren to celebrate his extraordinary achievements as an Olympic sportsman, a husband of 38 years and the world's greatest dad. Created as part of the 'Memory's Voice: Capturing Stories of Courage' workshop, an ACMI Digital Storytelling Project in association with Alzheimer's Australia Vic and in partnership with VicHealth.
